Rating: Rated 4 stars out of five stars

The app doesn't allow for a granular control over which type of notifications are to be displayed through android 10's system settings. So the notifications can either be turned off entirely or leave it on with its daily notification.

Rating: Rated 2 stars out of five stars

More than good looking, an important app like this should be easy and comprehensive to use, like the previous version. With this new layout, I can't even find out the option to check my account balance. Please fix it and I'll rate it 5 stars, like it actually deserves.

Rating: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
ReviewText: I liked the versatility of paytm. We can do basic things like recharges, bill payments etc that a UPI app should do. Besides, it can also be used to book flight tickets, bus, train, movie and what not. But I feel that paytm is still lacking the some features like individual payment room(like Phonepe and google pay where all payments to That particular contact are displayed in a chat like window). If Paytm introduces that feature, and betters the interface it would be a "No Brainer".

For me it was charging 150 to transfer my money INR 2500 to my HDFC account linked to it. It is not a trust worthy app at all. 5 out of 10 times i endup by paying cash to my vendors as app malfunctions.
